ChannelProgramLevel.name: ChannelProgramLevel
ChannelProgramLevel.description: Represents a level, based on member experience, in a channel program.

Description.description: Description of the channel program level.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

Name.description: Name of the channel program level.

OwnerId.description: Required. ID of the user who is the owner of the record.

Rank.description: An integer associated with the level. For example, 1 represents the lowest level, 2 the next level up, etc.

RecordTypeId.description: ID of the record type assigned to this object.
